project.name: C-C120B-PSQL-07-ST03-DT03-DF17-CF23-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C120B-PSQL-07-ST03-DT03-DF17-CF23-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: initalize a database Has a fixed heap buffer of size 64. (char [64])

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="AAA" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: (UTF8 OR ASCII) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C120B-PSQL-07-ST03-DT03-DF17-CF23-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: perform a select Has a fixed heap buffer of size 64. (char [64])

process.script: sleep 22 && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/psql -h ss-localhost -d booktown -p 8432 -c "SELECT * FROM books WHERE title = 'Dune'"

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="Hellow world!" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887
if [[ -s "$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/postgres.pid" ]]; then kill $(cat "$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/postgres.pid"); else echo "Skipping postgres kill, no PID file."; fi;

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-02 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C120B-PSQL-07-ST03-DT03-DF17-CF23-01-BAD-02
iopair.description: Has a fixed heap buffer of size 64. (char [64])

process.script: sleep 22 && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/psql -d booktown -h ss-localhost -p 8432 -c "CREATE TABLE stonesoup ( cwe varchar(6), progress varchar(12), UNIQUE(cwe) )"

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="This is probably going to overflow a buffer of some sort. Let's run it anyway and see what happens. I hope that everything turns out ok, because I would love to see what this looks like in all CAPS. Converting ASCII characters to upper case is easy, you can either call a system function, or just add the standard difference between the start of the two character sets. But, I am sure there is a reason that system functions exist for this sort of functionality." --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887
if [[ -s "$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/postgres.pid" ]]; then kill $(cat "$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/postgres.pid"); else echo "Skipping postgres kill, no PID file."; fi;

(NOT PERFORMER AND (segfault_glibc_6VEE6DpuD5 OR print_overflowed_buffer_vJBgfdzvr3 OR (segfault_code_Ca9Aq5RvCL OR segfault_code_o7TCvDKDNg OR segfault_code_tJ9ojmE2Du OR segfault_code_OJmsltXQQo OR segfault_code_rrQcqIhnzP OR segfault_code_lYldlMccmE OR segfault_msg_KQBZt2bslZ OR illegal_inst_msg_czNfOSSv5P)) AND NOT timeout_vYEyz8zjrI) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((segfault_glibc_6VEE6DpuD5 OR print_overflowed_buffer_vJBgfdzvr3 OR (segfault_code_Ca9Aq5RvCL OR segfault_code_o7TCvDKDNg OR segfault_code_tJ9ojmE2Du OR segfault_code_OJmsltXQQo OR segfault_code_rrQcqIhnzP OR segfault_code_lYldlMccmE OR segfault_msg_KQBZt2bslZ OR illegal_inst_msg_czNfOSSv5P)) OR timeout_vYEyz8zjrI OR controlled_exit_C7RRtuVbk8))
